alert.note: Alert for Dickinson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:44PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Dickinson County through 515 PM CDT... At 444 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles north of Moonlight, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Chapman, Enterprise and Moonlight. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 276 and 289. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central and east central Kansas.
